conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts the 2D plan into an isometric 3D cutaway with clear verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined walls, floors, and volume. Minor softening of corner geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major room layout matches well, but the external balcony areas and the 'L' shaped servant room annex are missing or simplified. Room counts roughly align but some internal partitions are shifted.

interior_elements.notes: Basic furniture placement (beds) present but lacks the variety and density of the floor plan (missing sofas, dining table, kitchen appliances).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no UI text. Lighting is soft but sufficient to define the space.

detected_errors.description: The entire servant room and utility wing at the bottom left of the original plan is omitted.
Living and dining room furniture sets are completely missing in the 3D render.

summary: A high-quality 3D transformation that accurately captures the core layout of the main apartment but simplifies external zones and secondary furniture elements.
